main.name: Devaanshi Chaturvedi
main.description: An extremely passionate and highly motivated
main.bio:
Hi there! I am Devaanshi Chaturvedi, a tech-savvy 4th-year Information Technology Engineering student from Banasthali Vidyapith. With a burning passion for knowledge and a knack for tinkering with cutting-edge tech, I am a developer.

Passionate about coding, open source, and App-Web development, I have a keen interest in AI/ML technology and IoT. I actively engage in tech communities, explore opportunities, participate in hackathons, attend conferences, and contribute to progressive community building.

Eager for teamwork and driven by the desire to seize golden opportunities, I am always ready to grind, level up, and make the most of every moment. Let's build something amazing together!
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me/ Hire me

work.title: IT consultant, Full Stack Developer
work.description: I developed the entire website for adagodord.com. ADAGODORD is a comprehensive legal services startup offering expert assistance in patent filing, confidential agreements, prior art search, patent drafting, litigation, product portfolio development, and consulting for new product portfolios.

work.title: Subscore Technical Team Member
work.description: Planned and organized technical events. Worked on the design of posters using UI/UX principles, Canva, and Figma.

achievements.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
